I feel the collective fatigue deeply. For years, everything has felt like an emergency. Yes/and:⁣
⁣
Putin’s invasion of Ukraine is a real emergency. It is a big deal. It will tragically alter the lives of Ukrainians. Putin wants the Soviet Union back. We should care about this.

Critically, Putin's emphasis on Ukraine's imagined nuclear weapons potential (based on legacy Soviet reactor & missile industrial base) also is likely to feature in operations within immediate invasion window. False claims possible as pretext for advance to or beyond the Dnieper
